tool_description: Tracks systematic sound changes in words across historical periods, identifying regular phonetic evolution patterns and sound correspondences.

word_forms.description: Historical forms of the word to analyze phonetically

time_periods.description: Corresponding time periods for each word form

transcription_system.description: Phonetic transcription system: IPA, traditional, simplified

sound_change_types.description: Types of sound changes to track: vowel_shifts, consonant_changes, lenition, fortition, metathesis

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: word_forms and time_periods must have the same length.
Insufficient data: Provide at least 2 word forms from different time periods.
Unsupported sound change type: Use valid types: vowel_shifts, consonant_changes, lenition, fortition, metathesis.
Phonetic analysis failed: Could not detect systematic sound changes in the provided forms.
usage: Input chronological word forms with their time periods, specify transcription system and sound change types to track. Returns detailed phonetic evolution analysis with identified sound laws.

phonetic_changes.description: Systematic sound changes identified between periods

sound_correspondences.description: Regular sound correspondences across time periods

regularity_assessment.description: Assessment of whether changes follow regular sound laws
